```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r}

homicides <- read_csv("homicide-data.csv", col_names = TRUE) %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  unite(col = "city_state", city, state, sep = ",") %>% 
  print()
```
```{r}
unsolved <- homicides %>% 
  mutate(arrests = str_extract(disposition, "Closed by arrest"),
         pending = str_extract(disposition, "Open/No arrest"),
         no_arrest = str_extract(disposition, "Closed without arrest")) %>% 
  group_by(city_state) %>%
  select(city_state, arrests, pending, no_arrest) %>% 
  print()
```
